posts.post_content:
better than vanilla, but unless you are playing against kamigawa block or changelings you are out of luck. also, considering there is a grand total of 8 ninjas, you are still screwed.   
  
This card can be used as a free sacrifice for an effect of your choice though, such as any enter the graveyard triggers. So it does have some use.
